items.sentence: Tom hasn't been the same since Mary left him.
Tom wants you to know what he can do to help.
Tom has never been willing to help us before.
Tom asked Mary to help John clean the garage.
I'm here to help Tom get ready for the party.
I think one of us ought to stay and help Tom.
Tom has a bank account in the Cayman Islands.
Tom was wearing a patch over one of his eyes.
Tom picked up one and looked at it carefully.
We're going to do what Tom said we should do.
Do you want to know why Tom isn't here today?
Tom spilled some red wine on his white shirt.
Tom usually drinks a lot more than Mary does.
Tom took out a magazine and began to read it.
Tom got seriously hurt in a traffic accident.
Tom feeds his dog at the same time every day.
Tom doesn't realize what Mary wants from him.
Tom obviously wanted to talk to me privately.
I wonder what Tom and Mary always talk about.
How long has it been since you talked to Tom?
The last time I spoke to Tom was last Monday.
Is it true you're staying at Tom's apartment?
Just stay in the kitchen until Tom goes home.
Tom seems to be having trouble staying awake.
Tom's mother packed his lunch in a paper bag.
Was Tom the one who gave you this squirt gun?
Why did you laugh when I told you I knew Tom?
Tom was just telling me about your new house.
Tom should be able to tell you where Mary is.
Tom never does anything unless I tell him to.
Tom doesn't need me to tell him how to do it.
Tom and Mary told me their new baby is a boy.
Tell Tom I don't want him dating my daughter.
Everyone is waiting for Tom to say something.
No one except Tom knows what really happened.
Tom doesn't even bother to insult me anymore.
Tom doesn't know what Mary might be thinking.
Tom went through all the files in the drawer.
Tom handed Mary an envelope filled with cash.
Tom looked at himself in the bathroom mirror.
Tom probably doesn't even know where Mary is.
Tom threw a wadded-up piece of paper at Mary.
Tom tried the doorknob, but it wouldn't turn.
Tom held the canteen of water to Mary's lips.
Tom looks more like a teacher than a student.
Tom opened the front door to let the dog out.
Tom seems to be carrying some kind of weapon.
Tom rushed over to the window and looked out.
Tom told me exactly what was going to happen.
Tom asked me if I thought Mary was beautiful.
Do you know how Tom obtained the information?
Didn't you and Tom used to hang out together?
I hope Tom doesn't think I'm afraid to fight.
As it turned out, Tom was willing to help us.
Tom finally made it to the top of the stairs.
Hopefully, Tom will be back on his feet soon.
Tom was surrounded by a group of young girls.
Tom, is there anything we need to talk about?
I strongly suggest you stay out of Tom's way.
This is a story about a little boy named Tom.
There's a guy named Tom Jackson on death row.
Tom just wants Mary to answer some questions.
I agreed to buy it for three hundred dollars.
Give me Tom's phone number and I'll call him.
Tom put his suitcase in the trunk of the car.
Tom put a cup of hot coffee in front of Mary.
Tom started drinking after his wife left him.
Tom drank three glasses of wine at the party.
Tom knew Mary wasn't really paying attention.
Norwegian is the official language of Norway.
Tom will stay here with us until next Monday.
Everest is the highest mountain in the world.
There are a lot of dustballs under the couch.
Do you want me to teach you some swear words?
The United States is a country of immigrants.
Stop leaving your clothes all over the floor.
Is it true that Europeans don't shower daily?
Which branch of the armed forces were you in?
We visited the historic sites of the country.
Try to slice the meat with a different knife.
The shirt that I've just bought is very nice.
Things are the same, but people have changed.
This is the first time I've waited this long.
Please speak slowly, so I can understand you.
You'll never guess what happened to me today.
Why don't we go see what's happening outside?
Tom didn't know how much I wanted to see him.
Tom had never been in such a big city before.
Tom got into a heated argument with his boss.
Everybody here but me has lived in Australia.
How long did it take you to get to Australia?
Tom drove past Mary's house and waved at her.
Three explosions were heard in the last hour.
Tom made a reservation at a fancy restaurant.
Tom definitely won't get a chance to do that.
Tom suggested we stay home and watch a movie.
I hope this puts an end to Tom's complaining.
You'll never find anybody to do that for you.
When are you going to publish these findings?
If that happened, it would start a civil war.
